questions: Examine the role of pressure groups and movements in deepening democracy.
answers: Pressure groups and movements have deepened democracy :  It reminds the government of the needs and concerns of ordinary citizens.  Put pressure on the rulers for the unhealthy activities.  It performs a useful role of countering undue influence of the rich and powerful people.   One single group cannot achieve dominance over society.  The government gets to hear about what different sections of the population want.  This leads to a rough balance of power and accommodation of conflicting interests.  1 + 5 = 5

questions: “Pressure groups and movements exert influence on politics in different ways”. Support the statement with suitable examples.  How do pressure groups and movements exert influence on politics? Explain with examples.
answers: Influence of pressure groups and movements on politics :  Pressure groups and movements try to gain public support and sympathy for their goal.  They carry out information campaigns, organize meetings and file petitions.  They also try to influence media to give more attention to their issues.  They often organize protest activity like strike etc.  Worker‘s organization employees, association and most of the movement groups force the government to consider their demands.  Business groups often employ professional lobbyists.  Some pressure groups formed and led by the leaders of political parties.  Some political parties grow out of movements.  1 + 5 = 5
